alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 21 at 11:51AM MDT until May 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Fremont and Huerfano Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and periods of limited visibility, especially under heavier snow bands.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
